name: Trick or Defeat
description:
Summary

Now that the days grow shorter and the leafs turn all shades of yellow, brown and red, the spooky season is on the horizon. Place candy-shooting turrets on the map to defend your little candy house from all kinds of scary foes. But be quick, new danger arrives every 10 seconds!

Controls

LMB - Place Turret (choose one before on the right side)

RMB - Stop placing Turret

Cannon Turret - Single Target Dmg

Green Turret - Slows Enemies down

Lila Turret - Deals AoE Damage

For best experience use the available Desktop Builds!

Team

Milmalissa & zeichn - Digital Artists

manio - Sound Director

manio, Mauricio Plasma, Tabea Wink - Music

ThePeat, Amomamo, serefbulbul, Julian & CaveDave - Developers

Foreign Assets Font:

Mrs Monster Font https://www.1001freefonts.com/mrs-monster.font

DAWs:

Studio One 5 & Reaper | Nightmares VST

Heavy Canonball shot - https://freesound.org/people/man/sounds/14615/ Mid Canonball shot - Weapon Gun Shot Gun 12 Gauage Benelli Automatic Single Shot Interior Shooting Range 01 Light Canonball shot - Weapon Machine Gun World War II Historical Single Shot 01 Pumpkin dying sound - Animal Mammal Carnivore Grizzly Bear Roar 01 (Offers.adobe.com) Player Lose Health - https://freesfx.co.uk/sfx/candy
